vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.14.2; married to Joash (H3101I);
mother of: Amaziah (H0558); also called Jehoaddin at 2Ki.14.2;
§ Jehoaddan = "Jehovah delights"
wife of king Joash and mother of king Amaziah of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: esposa del rey Joás; madre del rey Amasías de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約耶但 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華欣喜"
猶大王約阿施的妻子, 亞瑪謝王的母親 (王下 14:2;代下 25:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约耶但 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华欣喜"
犹大王约阿施的妻子, 亚玛谢王的母亲 (王下 14:2;代下 25:1)
